body_html:
I was initially thinking about providing support for those in an external library, which could be imported and used together with pytorch.
This would make it easier for researchers to experiment by modifying the existing implementation, as if it was integrated in pytorch the user would need to recompile everything.
What do you think?
body_text:
I was initially thinking about providing support for those in an external library, which could be imported and used together with pytorch.
This would make it easier for researchers to experiment by modifying the existing implementation, as if it was integrated in pytorch the user would need to recompile everything.
What do you think?
body:
I was initially thinking about providing support for those in an external library, which could be imported and used together with pytorch.
This would make it easier for researchers to experiment by modifying the existing implementation, as if it was integrated in pytorch the user would need to recompile everything.
What do you think?
